thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au | 3 of 699
thread.title: ANTHONY
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by ANTHONY

author: ANTHONY
title: ANTHONY
text:
The good: easy one priced structured which is fuss free especially when you want full comprehensive insurance.
The not so good: terrible software where they never can pick up your member number therefore each time you book you have to fill in the whole gambit which is a real pain.
Also, they need to clean the insider of the windows that become laden with a dirt film if not regularly cleaned.
The Enterprise ownership is rather confusing wherein they need to use one co-ordinated range of software that has an AU site.
